original_text: Therefore the Lord said to Solomon, “Since this has been your practice and you have not kept my covenant and my statutes that I have commanded you, I will surely tear the kingdom from you and will give it to your servant.
korean_text: 여호와께서 솔로몬에게 말씀하시되 네게 이러한 일이 있었고 또 네가 내 언약과 내가 네게 명령한 법도를 지키지 아니하였으니 내가 반드시 이 나라를 네게서 빼앗아 네 신하에게 주리라

sentences.original_text: Therefore the Lord said to Solomon,
Since this has been your practice
and you have not kept my covenant
and my statutes that I have commanded you,
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 네게 명한 나의 규례들을 지키지 아니하였으니

sentences.original_text: I will surely tear the kingdom from you
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 반드시 이 나라를 네게서 빼앗아

sentences.original_text: and will give it to your servant.
